title: Meet the new trainers of Rawalpindi Express ‘Shoaib Akhtar’
text:
Pakistan’s former prolific pacer Shoaib Akhtar has introduced his two new trainers who will be training with him in Islamabad on a daily basis.

On his official channel on YouTube, Akhtar introduced two young kids who used to tease him while training at a ground in Islamabad capturing the view of Margalla Hills.

The street boys were called upon by Akhtar to do training with him instead of begging on the roads of Islamabad.

“These boys used to do hooting on me while I train here so today I thought to call them and have some training along with chit chat,” the legendary pacer said.

Akhtar conveyed a message through his video that let such children do something healthy in their lives instead of begging. “These boys sell books on the streets. The reason behind calling them was to make sure that they don’t beg. I would like to request all people out there to take care of such needy people around you,” he said.

It is pertinent to mention here that Akhtar is active on social media where he keeps on engaging with his fans while sharing his personal life and analysis on cricket.
